list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: emerge or cause to emerge from a state of sleep; stop sleeping.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô tỉnh dậy cảm thấy tốt hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a watch or vigil held beside the body of someone who has died, sometimes accompanied by ritual observances including eating and drinking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was attending a friend's wake
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đang tham dự Wake của một người bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in some parts of the UK) a festival and holiday held annually in a rural parish, originally on the feast day of the patron saint of the church.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his workers absented themselves for the local wakes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những người lao động của ông đã cho mình những người tỉnh táo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a trail of disturbed water or air left by the passage of a ship or aircraft.
